PROPER_NAME: This is displayed in the tooltip.
DESCRIPTION: This is displayed in the tooltip. Spaces should not be used be avoided in NAMES, with the exception of multi-word keywords (see next entry).
Make sure the first element in NAMES has no underscores. The rest should use _ in the place of spaces. In card text, you'll use the underscore versions.
A card that is Locked can't be played until it is Unlocked. When a card is unlocked and played, it locks itself back to its original Locked value.
Unlocking a card removes a stack of Lock on it
Unlock all cards in hand. Unlocking a card removes a stack of Lock on it. A card that is Locked can't be played until it is Unlocked
Cards that are Unlockable can be played even while they are Locked.
Returns from the discard pile to your hand at the start of your turn if played.
Bleeding creatures lose HP at the start of their turn. Bleed deals more/less damage when the turn increases/decreases.
Gives energy spent on this card back, up to the maximum listed.
